mapper.select: SELECT e.EmployeeID as employeeId, e.Name as name, e.DateOfBirth as dateOfBirth, e.Gender as gender, e.DepartmentID as departmentId, e.Position as position, e.HireDate as hiredate, e.Status as status, e.PhoneNumber as phoneNumber, e.Email as email, d.DepartmentName as departmentName FROM Employee e LEFT JOIN Department d ON e.DepartmentID = d.DepartmentID WHERE e.EmployeeID = #{employeeId}
